text: On skazal: "YA khochu sochetat' tebya brakom s odnoyu iz etikh dvukh docherey moikh, s tem usloviyem, chtoby ty zaplatil mne vosem'yu godami sluzhby; a yesli khochesh' - polnymi desyat'yu, to eto zavisit ot tebya: ya ne khochu stesnyat' tebya; ty naydesh' menya, yesli ugodno Bogu, spravedlivym
